TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2SecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 表示會從 SAML 2.0 判斷提示建立安全性權杖的安全性權杖處理常式。

span.span: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 2.0 Assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖支援 SAML 2.0 判斷提示到物件。The class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 2.0 Assertions into objects. 安全性權杖處理常式負責建立、 讀取、 寫入和驗證權杖。Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens. 您可以設定安全性權杖服務 (STS)，或藉由新增執行個體的信賴憑證者 (rp) 應用程式處理 SAML 2.0 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖類別來設定服務 （或應用程式） 的物件。You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 2.0 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the class to the object configured for the service (or application). 這可以透過程式設計方式或組態檔中完成。This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file. 從指定集合的集合的組態設定的處理常式本身屬性加入至集合時。The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection's property when it is added to the collection. 雖然您可以藉由設定個別設定的處理常式其屬性，這通常不需要; 不過，如果處理常式必須個別設定，屬性應該設定之後，處理常式加入至集合。While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection. 許多情況下，類別可用來當做-; 不過，這個類別會提供許多擴充點透過方法它公開。For many scenarios, the class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes. 藉由衍生自和覆寫特定方法，您可以修改預設的實作，在提供的權杖處理的功能或您可以加入可能需要的 SAML 判斷提示規格中的處理延伸模組某些自訂的情況。By deriving from the and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，條件應該包含在判斷提示，來限制的判斷提示的誤用的影響。Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion. 指定的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件可以限制的弱點可能會在遭入侵的判斷提示的情況下。Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion. AudienceRestrictionCondition 可用來明確指定想要的信賴憑證者合作對象，或判斷提示，加上適當的對象限制強制在信賴憑證者的合作對象的合作對象可以幫助減輕信賴憑證者之間的詐騙攻擊合作對象。The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties. 預設實作會建立為基礎的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件屬性`tokenDescriptor`。The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the property of the `tokenDescriptor`. 它也會產生限制來判斷提示取用 AudienceRestrictionCondition屬性`tokenDescriptor`。It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the property of the `tokenDescriptor`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不是有效條件，則會擲回適當的例外狀況。Throws an appropriate exception if the condition is not valid. 語彙基元可能無法適用於多種原因所造成。The token may not be valid for a number of reasons. 例如，在權杖的有效期間內可能不到目前的時間、 語彙基元可能包含衝突或無效，資料或語彙基元可能包含不支援的 SAML 2.0 項目。For example, the current time may not be within the token's validity period, the token may contain data that is contradictory or not valid, or the token may contain unsupported SAML 2.0 elements.
